segment.source: You can deploy App-V 5.0 packages using an Electronic Software Distribution (ESD) solution.
segment.target: You can deploy App-V 5.0 packages using an Electronic Software Distribution (ESD) solution.

segment.source: For information about planning to deploy App-V packages with an ESD, see Planning to Deploy App-V 5.0 with an Electronic Software Distribution System.
segment.target: For information about planning to deploy App-V packages with an ESD, see Planning to Deploy App-V 5.0 with an Electronic Software Distribution System.

segment.source: To deploy App-V packages with Microsoft System Center 2012 Configuration Manager, see Introduction to Application Management in Configuration Manager
segment.target: To deploy App-V packages with Microsoft System Center 2012 Configuration Manager, see Introduction to Application Management in Configuration Manager

segment.source: How to Enable Only Administrators to Publish Packages by Using an ESD
segment.target: How to Enable Only Administrators to Publish Packages by Using an ESD

segment.source: Explains how to configure the App-V client to enable only administrators to publish and unpublish packages when you’re using an ESD.
segment.target: Explains how to configure the App-V client to enable only administrators to publish and unpublish packages when you’re using an ESD.
